Package omp2gpu.exec

Class OMP2GPUDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • cetus.exec.Driver
      • omp2gpu.exec.OMP2GPUDriver
  • public class OMP2GPUDriver
extends Driver
    OMP2GPUDriver implements the command line parser and controls pass ordering. Users may extend this class by overriding runPasses (which provides a default sequence of passes). The derived class should pass an instance of itself to the run method. Derived classes have access to a protected Program object.
